items.title: Is The Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW) the Best Monopoly Stock to Buy Now?
items.description: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Monopoly Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) stands against the other monopoly stocks. Morgan Stanley believes the bull market might not be finished, and the S&P 500 might close the year with single-digit gains. There […]

items.title: Fidelity Magellan Fund Q1 2025  Commentary
items.description: For Q1 2025, Fidelity Magellan Fund returned -5.87%, trailing the -4.27% advance of the benchmark S&P 500 index. Click here to read the full commentary.
